alert.note: Alert for Northern Coos; Southern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 24 at 10:49AM EST until February 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...VERY COLD WIND CHILLS TONIGHT... .An arctic airmass arrives today with temperatures falling well below zero tonight. Combined with gusty northwesterly winds, wind chill values are expected to fall below -20 degrees tonight. Conditions improve as winds ease tomorrow morning. ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...In Maine, Central Somerset, Northern Franklin, and Northern Oxford Counties. In New Hampshire, Northern Coos and Southern Coos Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
